src:
Gavrilović: Treba nam svežine, zadovoljan sam reakcijom u trećoj četvrtini
Trener Crvene zvezde ističe da je poslednja deonica rezultat dobre odbrane koju je Real igrao tokom čitavog meča

07 Nov 2019

Nije uspela Crvena zvezda da dođe do pobede pred svojim navijačima protiv Real Madrida. Ključna je bila četvrta četvrtina u kojoj su Kraljevići napravili odlučujuću seriju poena i na kraju čak i prilično ubedljivo slavili.
Trener Crvene zvezde, Andrija Gavrilović, nakon utakmice istakao je da su dešavanja u četvrtoj četvrtini posledica odlične igre Reala u defanzivi tokom svih 40 minuta."Želeo bih da čestitam Realu, jer mislim da su odigrali odličnu defanzivnu utakmicu čitavih 40 minuta. To je bio naš problem danas i mislim da je poslednja četvrtina samo rezultat svega što su oni pokazali u celoj utakmici, jako su igrali, čvrsti su bili na lopti. Srećan sam na reakciju mog tima u trećoj četvrtini. Borili su se, uzvratili su, prešli su i u prednost. Ali na kraju smo ipak platili cenu dobre odbrane Reala", rekao je strateg crveno-belih.
Zanimalo je sve zbog čega je Crvena zvezda toliko pala u igri u poslednjih deset minuta utakmice."U poslednjoj četvrtini procenti šuta su bili rezultat onoga što se dešavalo pre toga. Krenulo je tako što su oni dali tri trojke, a mi promašili sve, pa čak i bacanja. Mi želimo kod kuće da igramo brže u tranziciji. Imali smo oslabljenu prednju liniju neigranjem Filipa Čovića, a Braun je igrao prekovremeno", izjavio je Gavrilović.



Bilo je očigledno da Crvena zvezda tokom većeg dela utakmice muku muči sa ofanzivnim skokom."Naročito u prvoj četvrtini je bilo situacija gde smo bili stegnuti i nerazigrani i bilo je situacija kada niko u reketu nije bio tu da pokupi taj skok, iako je dogovor i pravilo da dva igrača uvek idu na skok. Što se tiče njihovog skoka, Tavares posle svojih kretnji u dubinu ostaje tu i hvata skok, a Garuba je takođe agresivan na poziciji četiri. Morali smo da igramo ofanzivno, na granici faula, pa čak i ponekog slobodnog bacanja, te tako osujetimo možda neki šut za tri poena. Nažalost, to nije nikakvo opravdanje. Kada neki igrači četiri utakmice u nizu odigraju, fizički se istroše, kao Perperoglu, a Dženkins je imao problem sa faulovima i tu se iscrpela rotacija u poslednjoj četvrtini. Vreme brzo istekne, posle njihovih sedam trojki u poslednjoj četvrtini, razlika je otišla na njihovu stranu", istakao je trener crveno-belih.
Čini se da crveno-beli imaju dosta prostora za napredak u narednim utakmicama, te da sve može biti dosta razigranije i kreativnije."Treba nam svežine, izmene na poziciji plejmejkera, agresivnost na situacijama pik-en rola, treba nam izvor kreacije u napadu. Često to ume da bude Perperoglu, nekad to bude i Simanić. Oni su uspeli to danas da obrane. Znamo kakva je sezona, kakvi su zadaci i teškoće i možemo samo radom iz ovog sastava koji imamo da izvlačimo maksimum, te da rotiramo igrače koji se previše troše u ovom zgusnutom redosledu".
O dovođenju novih igrača u sastav, Andrija Gavrilović nije previše da govori, dok za Derika Brauna ističe da bi uskoro mogao da se priključi treninzima."Ne bih preuzimao na sebe tu odgovornost, razumećete iz kog razloga. Derik Braun čeka dva specijalistička pregleda pre nego što dobije zeleno svetlo da trenira sa ekipom. Ima povredu kolena koje je posledica nekih ranijih intervencija. Mora da se vrati u formu, ima probleme sa tim", rekao je Gavrilović.
Danas na terenu nije bilo Filipa Čovića. Trener crveno-belih kaže da je plejmejker doživeo manju povredu na jučerašnjem treningu."Juče na treningu je povredio koleno. Bio je na magnetnoj rezonanci, istegao je prednji ukršteni ligament. Ne znam kada će se vratiti u normalu, biće potrebno nekoliko dana".
Ni Davidovca nije bilo u rosteru, dok je Lazić nakon udarca koji je dobio dosta manje igrao u nastavku meča."Davidovac ima bol u leđima, treba da sanira upalu, radi terapije i leči se nekim medikamentima. Lazić je dobio udarac u nos, ali je bio spreman da se vrati. Međutim, zbog energije koju je doneo Dobrić i zbog toga što je Dobrić pokrio taj pritisak u odbrani, zato ga nisam više koristio", zaključio je Gavrilović.

Piše: 
Srđan TODOROVIĆ

Foto: 
Star Sport
text:
Gavrilovic: We need freshness, I'm satisfied with the reaction in the third quarter
The Red Star coach points out that the last stretch was the result of the good defense Real played throughout the match

07 Nov 2019

The Red Star failed to win in front of its fans against Real Madrid. Crucial was the fourth quarter in which the Kings made a decisive series of points and even celebrated quite convincingly in the end.
Red Star coach Andrija Gavrilovic said after the game that the events in the fourth quarter were the result of Real's excellent defense in all 40 minutes. "I would like to congratulate Real, because I think they played a great defensive game for the entire 40 minutes. our problem today and I think the last quarter is just the result of everything they showed throughout the game, they played really hard, they were solid on the ball.I am happy with my team response in the third quarter. advantage. But in the end, we still paid the price of a good Real defense, "said the red-and-white strategist.
It was interesting to know why the Red Star fell so much in the game in the last ten minutes of the game. "In the last quarter, the shot percentages were the result of what had happened before. It started by giving them three threes and we missed everything, so even throwing. We want at home to play faster in transition. We had a weakened front line by not playing Filip Covic, and Brown was playing overtime, "Gavrilovic said.



It was obvious that Red Star was struggling with the offensive rebound for most of the game. "Especially in the first quarter there were situations where we were tight and unplayable and there were situations when no one in the racket was there to pick up that rebound, even though the deal the rule is that two players always go for the jump. As for their jump, Tavares, after his deep moves, stays there and catches the jump, and Garuba is also aggressive at position 4. We had to play offensively, on the verge of fouls, and sometimes a free throw, so let's block out a three-point shot, unfortunately, that is no excuse.When some players play four games in a row, they physically wear out, like Perperoglu, and Jenkins had a foul problem and the last rotation was exhausted. Time is running out fast, after their seven threes in the last quarter, the difference has gone their way, "the red and white coach pointed out.
The red and whites seem to have a lot of room for improvement in the coming games, and everything can be a lot more playful and creative. " Often, it can be Perperoglu, sometimes it will be Simanić, and they have managed to defend it today. We know what the season is, what the tasks and difficulties are, and we can only work out of this squad that we have the best and rotate players who spend too much in this condensed order ".
Andrija Gavrilovic is not too much about bringing in new players, while he points out to Derrick Brown that he could join the training soon. "I would not take that responsibility, you will understand for what reason. Derik Brown waits for two specialist examinations before getting the green light to train with the team. He has a knee injury that is due to some earlier interventions. He has to get back in shape, he has problems with that, "Gavrilovic said.
There was no Filip Covic in the field today. The red-and-white coach says the playmaker suffered a minor injury at yesterday's training session. "He injured his knee yesterday at training. He was on magnetic resonance. He was stretching his anterior cruciate ligament. I don't know when it will return to normal. It will take several days."
The Davidic was also not in the roster, while Lazic played much less in the continuation of the match after the hit. "The Davidic has back pain, needs to repair inflammation, for therapy and to be treated with some medications. Lazic has a blow to his nose, but However, because of the energy brought by Dobrić and because Dobrić covered that pressure in defense, that is why I did not use it anymore, "concluded Gavrilović.

Writes:
Srdjan TODOROVIC

Photo:
Star Sport
